Title: Provides a tax deduction of up to ten thousand dollars for any person who donates a human organ to another human being
Summary: Provides a tax deduction of up to ten thousand dollars for any person who donates a human organ to another human being; provides job security for those individuals who miss work during the recovery period from a human organ donation.
LawCode: Amd ยง612, Tax L; amd ยง201-d, Lab L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to providing a tax deduction for donating organs; and to amend the labor law, in relation to job security for those individuals who decide to donate an organ
